thread.section_title: ERIK'S Bike - Board - Ski Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ERIK'S Bike - Board - Ski | eriksbikeshop.com
thread.title: Jake
thread.title_full: ERIK'S Bike - Board - Ski reviewed by Jake

author: Jake
title: Jake
text: I ordered a pair of specialized elite mtb shoes. Upon arrival I noticed the cleat plate on the right shoe was missing. I called immediately after noticing and the part was shipped out same day first class mail. Unfortunately, I was unable to ride over the weekend, but I got the plate on the following Monday and will be good to go for this next weekend. Quick shipping, quick to correct the mistake, and friendly to deal with.
